item.title: [Dementhium 639] Randomizing and naming it
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

If I guess the number correctly I get a random item and it says the name of the random item (this is how I want it).
But when I guess the correct number I get 10 random items and it says all the names of all the strings in the arrays.

if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("Guess")) { int amount = Integer.parseInt(command[1]); if (amount == Math.round((Math.random*6)+3).intValue() && player.getDefinition().getGuess() == 0) { for (int i = 0; i < player.Rewards.length; i++) { player.getInventory().addItem(player.randomRewards(), 1); player.getDefinition().setGuess(1); player.sendMessage("You recieved " + player.RewardNames[i] + " as a reward."); } } else if (player.getDefinition().getGuess() >= 1){ player.sendMessage("You cannot guess more than once."); } else { player.sendMessage("You fail..."); player.getDefinition().setGuess(1); } }

[code=java] public static String RewardNames[] = {“Armadyl Godsword”, “Bandos Godsword”, “Saradomin Godsword”, “Zamorak Godsword”, “Chaotic Rapier”, “Chaotic Longsword”, “Chaotic Maul”, “Chaotic Staff”, “Chaotic Crossbow”, “Chaotic Kitesheild”};
public static int Rewards[] = {11694, 11696, 11698, 11700, 18349, 18351, 18353, 18355, 18357, 18359};

public int randomReward() {
	return Rewards[(int)(Math.random()*Rewards.length)];
}[/code]

I need help making it give 1 random item and make it say the name of the random item given.

Read full topic
